select analysisintermediatetable.factory factory, analysisintermediatetable.project project, ifnull(t2.summoney, 0) summoney, ifnull(t2.sumcount, 0) sumcount from analysisintermediatetable left join ( select factory project, sum(money) summoney, count(times) sumcount from ( select * from settlementnew where shopid = #{shopid} and createtime between #{from} and #{to} and (factory = "美容" or factory = "美体" or factory = "仪器")) t group by factory ) t2 on t2.project = analysisintermediatetable.project where analysisintermediatetable.factory = "实操类"
union all

select staff.name name, settlementnew.createtime as time, settlementnew.projectname projectname, sum(money) summoney, count(projectname) count, sum(hand) sumhand from settlementnew inner join staff on (settlementnew.beautician1 = staff.staffid or settlementnew.beautician2 = staff.staffid)
and staff.staffid = #{staffid}
and factory in ('美容','美体','仪器')
and consumptioncategory in ('现金卡','现金产品','现金实操')
and settlementnew.createtime between #{from} and #{to} and settlementnew.shopid=#{shopid} group by staff.staffid,createtime
